result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Alexis N Hernandez

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Alexis N Hernandez appeared by video.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes appeared by video for Alexis N Hernandez.  Prosecuting attorney Gregg Herman appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm 
Pretrial Conference held.  Defendant was on zoom and never reappeared.  Court order a stayed Bench Warrant.  

CASE RECALLED AT THE HOUR OF 9:40 AM
Defendant appears.  Defense requests a Bail/Bond Hearing; Final Pretrial and Jury Trial date.  Parties advised all pretrial documents are to be filed by the Final Pretrial date.
Bail/bond hearing scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Final pre-trial scheduled for January 9, 2023 at 01:30 pm.
Jury trial scheduled for February 13, 2023 at 09:00 am.
State's Amended Witness List received and filed.  bm
Received and Filed.
Signature bond previously set continues. Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4.
Defendant advised No Contact Order as ordered 6.24.22 remains in full force and effect.  Defendant to have no contact with A.H.; D.H.; and MGP.

Defendant Alexis N Hernandez appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Jason A Findling appeared by video for Alexis N Hernandez.  Attorney Karine O'Byrne appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Alexis N Hernandez not in court.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court for Alexis N Hernandez.  Prosecuting attorney Sarah Dahdouh in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a jury trial. Defendant did not appear. Case is in trial posture. Case passed to allow time for defendant to appear.

Case recalled at 10:08. Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued forthwith. COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT. Court takes no action as to bail.

Defendant Alexis N Hernandez appeared by video.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court for Alexis N Hernandez.  Attorney Sarah Dahdouh in court for State of Wisconsin. Deputy court clerk cmt. 
Final pretrial held. Case remains in trial posture. Jury trial first call scheduled for 09-14-2022 at 9:00 am, Branch 30.
filed by the State
filed by the State

Defendant Alexis N Hernandez in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Sarah Dahdouh appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Alexis N Hernandez appeared by video means with Attorney. Victim MC appeared with Victim Witness Advocate.
Case in court for a deferred prosecution agreement hearing. Defense requests to adjourn today's hearing and requests final pre-trial and jury trial dates. 
Case adjourned.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 29, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for September 14, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Alexis N Hernandez in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Alexis N Hernandez appeared by video means with Attorney.
Case in court for deferred prosecution agreement. For reasons stated on the record, Defense requests an adjournment. Case adjourned to Br 30.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for August 9, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Received and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with A.H,D.H and MGP.

Defendant Alexis N Hernandez in court via zoom.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes in person in court.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case heard in Branch 25 for Branch 30.  Case in court for Return on Doctor's report.    Doctor's report received and filed.  Parties reviewed Dr. Jenna Goebel report and do not contest findings. State, defense and defendant waive right to hearing. Court found defendant competent to proceed and reinstated proceedings.  Arguments heard as to bail. The Court order the Bail remain.  Case scheduled in, Branch 30.
  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for July 14, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Case spun to Judge Franke, Branch 25 due to judge unavailability.
Proposed Order received and filed
Case rescheduled off the record due to judge unavailability.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for June 24, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Received and Filed.
Order for Competency Examination by Department of Health Services; signed, filed, and forwarded to Forensics.

Defendant Alexis N Hernandez in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Defendant Alexis N Hernandez in custody.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Alexis N Hernandez appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Victim appeared by zoom.  Court is advised by the defense there is reason to believe the defendant is not competent to proceed.  Pursuant to Sec. 971.14 (2) Wisconsin Statutes, Court found probable cause, suspended proceedings, and ordered defendant examined by Wisconsin Forensic Unit.  Order for Examination, signed and filed.  Case adjourned, Br. 30.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for June 22, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
State's Motion to Modify Conditions of Bail, received and filed.

Defendant Alexis N Hernandez in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Alexis N Hernandez appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Pretrial Conference held.  Victim present in Court.  Defense counsel requests DPA Hearing date.  Case adjourned, Br. 30.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for May 20, 2022 at 09:00 am.
received and filed.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with MGP

Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.  
Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.

Defendant Alexis N Hernandez in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Defendant Alexis N Hernandez in custody.  Edward OBrien appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Alexis N Hernandez appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/76b667a0-98a1-69d4-e783-9185dc35fcc1  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 23, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
